title: Dialogflow - Other samples and learning material
abstract:
# Dialogflow - Other samples and learning material
The [quickstarts](/dialogflow/cx/docs/quick) and [how-to guides](/dialogflow/cx/docs/how) provide basic, detailed tutorials and samples. This page lists other high quality samples and courses found on other sites.
content:
## Google Cloud Skills Boost
The following courses are available in [Google Cloud Skills Boost](https://www.cloudskillsboost.google/) , and you can earn Google Cloud badges:
- [Contact Center AI: Conversational Design Fundamentals](https://www.cloudskillsboost.google/course_templates/160?catalog_rank=%7B%22rank%22%3A1%2C%22num_filters%22%3A0%2C%22has_search%22%3Atrue%7D&search_id=18484514) 
- [Virtual Agent Development in Dialogflow CX for Citizen Devs](https://www.cloudskillsboost.google/course_templates/307?catalog_rank=%7B%22rank%22%3A7%2C%22num_filters%22%3A0%2C%22has_search%22%3Atrue%7D&search_id=19936306) 
- [Virtual Agent Development in Dialogflow CX for Software Devs](https://www.cloudskillsboost.google/course_templates/309?catalog_rank=%7B%22rank%22%3A6%2C%22num_filters%22%3A0%2C%22has_search%22%3Atrue%7D&search_id=19936306) 
- [Contact Center AI: Operations and Implementation](https://www.cloudskillsboost.google/course_templates/165?catalog_rank=%7B%22rank%22%3A1%2C%22num_filters%22%3A0%2C%22has_search%22%3Atrue%7D&search_id=18484509) 
- [Skill badge: Create Conversational AI Agents with Dialogflow CX](https://www.cloudskillsboost.google/quests/185) ## Coursera
Coursera offers the following courses:
- [Contact Center AI: Conversational Design Fundamentals](https://www.coursera.org/learn/contact-center-ai-conversational-design-fundamentals) 
- [Virtual Agent Development in Dialogflow CX for Citizen Devs](https://www.coursera.org/programs/google-specialization/browse?collectionId=&productId=HgQw8PvcEeu9eBIb90qKRQ&productType=course&query=virtual+agent&showMiniModal=true&source=search) 
- [Virtual Agent Development in Dialogflow CX for Software Devs](https://www.coursera.org/programs/google-specialization/browse?collectionId=&productId=XM_mPAHAEeyXgRJdlcYsHQ&productType=course&query=virtual+agent&showMiniModal=true&source=search) 
- [Contact Center AI: Operations and Implementation](https://www.coursera.org/programs/google-specialization/browse?collectionId=&productId=GQYD9AwAEeuLRAqUiS7ZKQ&productType=course&query=contact+center+AI&showMiniModal=true&source=search) ## Pluralsight
Pluralsight offers the following courses:
- [Contact Center AI: Conversational Design Fundamentals](https://app.pluralsight.com/library/courses/ccai-conversational-design-fundamentals) 
- [Virtual Agent Development in Dialogflow CX for Citizen Devs](https://app.pluralsight.com/library/courses/virtual-agent-development-dialogflow-cx-citizen-devs) 
- [Virtual Agent Development in Dialogflow CX for Software Devs](https://app.pluralsight.com/library/courses/virtual-agent-development-dialogflow-cx-software-devs) 
- [Contact Center AI: Operations and Implementation](https://app.pluralsight.com/library/courses/ccai-operations-implementation) ## Community-created components
**Note:** Google does not provide support for these components.
The Dialogflow community has created the following components:
| Component                  | Links                 |
|:--------------------------------------------------------------------------------|:----------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Actions on Google Guess Game by Kuldeep Kumar Sharma       | https://github.com/Kuldeep-Kumar-Sharma/AOC-Guess-The-Capital   |
| Conversational Glue (Conversational driven website navigation) by Owen Smith | https://github.com/CaffeineFusion/conversational-glue     |
| Dialogflow CX CLI tool by Xavier Portilla Edo         | https://github.com/xavidop/dialogflow-cx-cli       |
| Discord component by Denis Valášek            | https://github.com/DenisVCode/dialogflow-cx-discord     |
| Discord component by John Dikeman            | https://github.com/johndikeman/DFCXDiscord       |
| Golang webhook by Xavier Portilla Edo           | https://github.com/xavidop/dialogflow-cx-webhook-go     |
| Javasript webhook boilerplate by Pratik Kotian         | https://github.com/pratikkotian04/webhook-boilerplate     |
| Multivocal uniform TypeScript library for creating webhooks by Alan Fristenberg | https://github.com/afirstenberg/multivocal       |
| Neo4J Museum integration by Dou Liu            | https://github.com/LDLucien/dfcx_virtual_museum_guide     |
| Python webhook for ML users by Yan Pheng Choo         | https://github.com/yptheangel/dialogflowcx-custom-webhook    |
| Raspberry Pi integration by Nidhin Kumar          | https://github.com/nidhinkumar06/RaspberryPi-DialogflowCX    |
| React Native Component by Daniel Cabello          | https://github.com/DKbyo/react-native-dialogflow-cx     |
| Slack integration by Sampriti Mitra            | https://github.com/Sampriti-Mitra/dialogflow-slack-sdk    |
| Telephony Java IVR integration by Shivaprasad Mohanrao       | https://github.com/shivaprasadmohanrao/dfcx_telephony_integration.git |
| TypeScript UI component by Emmanuel Asamoah Botwe        | https://github.com/botchway44/covid-vaccine-appointment    |
| TypeScript classes and types for Dialogflow Messenger by Xavier Portilla Edo | https://github.com/xavidop/dialogflow-cx-messenger-ts     |
| TypeScript webhook for Google Analytics by Tom Hartogs       | https://github.com/TomHartogs/dialogflowcx-generic-webhooks   |
| TypeScript webhook by Xavier Portilla Edo          | https://github.com/xavidop/dialogflow-cx-webhook-typescript   |
| UI integration by Yüksel Tolun             | https://github.com/YTolun/dtl-bot          |
| Vonage integration (escape room) by Mark Berkeland        | https://github.com/mberkeland/DiabolicFlow       |
| WhatsApp, Twilio integration by Ayush Nigam          | https://github.com/ayushnig/dialogflowcx-whatsapp      |
| WhatsApp, Twilio, Springboot integration by Priti Sharma      | https://github.com/pritisharma127/dfcx-whatsapp-integration.git  |
